scripts.release:major: npm version major -m 'chore(release): bump version to %s' && npm run changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'docs(changelog): update for major release'
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -m 'chore(release): bump version to %s' && npm run changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'docs(changelog): update for minor release'
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -m 'chore(release): bump version to %s' && npm run changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'docs(changelog): update for patch release'
